title: Google Books API Search
description:
A project I did as my final presentation for a Frontend programming bootcamp using the Model-View-Controller architecture in vanilla JavaScript. Focusing mainly on the JavaScript part.

It takes information from Google Books and displays the results on search. I've also added the ability to add products in cart based on their API id. Although it's just visual, the JavaScript logic is made for backend implementation.

title: Mapty
description: A running/cycling app I've completed during a Udemy course for learning purposes, using geolocation and the leaflet library for an interactive map.
